t:
After half an hour of unsuccessful attempts at communicating with a ghost with the Ouija board, my friend became tired and said mischievously, “Tell a secret about me.”


Suddenly the planchette came to life and spelled out —
               M–U–R–D–E–R
c:
Breaking news: Prankster ghost gets innocent teenager arrested.



#ouijaboard #planchette #unsuccessful #mischief #murder #secret #ghost #communication
